articles.title: Dems plan Congress stock-trading ban in wake of Insider probe: report
articles.description: The plan, reported by Punchbowl News, came after Insider found widespread violation of a law meant to combat insider trading in Congress.
articles.content:
House Democrats are close to introducing a ban on stock trading for members of Congress, their spouses, and senior staff members, Punchbowl News reported, citing multiple unnamed sources.

articles.title: Trump asks appeals court for immunity from January 6 civil suits
articles.description: In February, a federal judge ruled that Trump could be sued over the Capitol riot, a decision the former president is appealing.
articles.content:

articles.title: Full text of Inflation Reduction Act, Manchin-Schumer deal for Biden agenda
articles.description: The agreement breaks a stalemate on Biden's agenda that lasted for nearly a year. It will include climate programs and tax hikes on corporations.
articles.content:

articles.title: McConnell assails Manchin spending deal after Dems strip his leverage
articles.description: Senate Republicans approved a semiconductor bill on Wednesday they had vowed to stop if Biden's agenda was revived. It came alive hours later.

articles.title: Former IMF Official Says Substantial Home Price Declines Are Ahead
articles.description: The Fed is likely to "keep monetary policy tight, even if inflation peaks," says Desmond Lachman. This will continue to weigh on housing demand.
